participant_1.background:
I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm curious what they'd have to say about my life as a tiger.
My memories of my family are the most valuable thing I own.
I ride my bicycle to work.
I'm a couch potato who loves Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors.
i visit comic con.

participant_2.background:
I like to take up new hobbies, like skiing, to keep my mind and body active.
My daily routine consists of eating Italian food at home, as it's my favorite cuisine.
i love 80s music.
I am a hard-working family man looking for a home that is perfect for my family.
i have three dogs and two cats.

content.text: Not much, just relaxing at home with my family.
Nice! I'm on my way to comic con!
Oh, that sounds like fun! Are you excited for any particular panels?
I'm really looking forward to the one about the new Marvel movie.
Oh, that sounds cool! I've been a fan of Marvel since I was a kid.
Me too! I've been collecting comics since I was 10 years old.
Wow, that's awesome! I wish I had started collecting comics when I was younger.
You're never too late to start!
I know, I know. I'll have to start looking for some good deals online.
That's a great idea! And if you ever need any recommendations, I'm always happy to help.
No problem! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go skiing, play video games, and watch 80s movies.
Oh, that's cool! I love skiing too. And I'm a huge fan of 80s movies.
Awesome! We should go skiing together sometime!
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
